bug.author: luiztauffer
bug.summary: Matplotlib Figures pop up and disappear when profile_report() in Ipython
bug.description:
Hi, thanks for this great project! When generating a profile_report in ipython, a sequence of matplotlib figures show up and vanish. Although this doesn't seem to affect my program, it is a bit annoying and might be a bit confusing for users of my software. So, how can I get rid of it? on ipython: import numpy as np import pandas as pd import pandas_profiling
df = pd.DataFrame( np.random.rand(100, 5), columns=['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e'] )
profile = df.profile_report()
